1. Go to Theros Wepons Shop
2. Buy iron longsword. Can look sign for quest context.
3. Get a lump of coal: Get spade from gardener in Matthias Mansion, go to Lost Mine, n n e, then dig coal
4. Return the theros, upgrate iron
5. Get a lump of hardened honey from bee have east of solace. kill queen, get stinger corpse, unlock honey, get all honey
6. Return to theros, present check theros, upgrade steel (may need to wait a couple of ticks before present check theros works if going too fast)
7. Get vial of dragon's blood by doing Theocrat quests. Kill bear (in cave e of solace), bugbear (along sageway east of solace), goblin king, and sabretooth tiger.
After killing each, do decapitate {mob} to get head. Return to theocrat, present bear theocrat, present bugbear theocrat, present king theocrat, present tiger theocrat. He will give you the vial of dragon's blood.

- To Tiger from SS: 25e 2n 3w 3s e (approx. may be wandering nearby)
8. Return to theros, present check theros, upgrade steel (may need to wait a couple of ticks before present check theros works if going too fast)
9. Wait a few ticks, then present check theros

- setup: loot goblin seductress in dv, go to quekul river spirit waterfall, listen woman present amulet in inventory, wield staff
- staff evolution: in any order kill irda sandmason, bakali shaman, kagonesti shaman (lashathal?), control spirit, bind spirit staff. then go back to waterfall, listen spirit, control spirit, bind spirit staff, recall and gather prep
- prep: immfire and some sort of limit damage is a must. you also need destroy undead, prot from undead, sanctify corpse, soul protection spells. go back to waterfall, nod, get staff, wield staff. a 4-6 heals and cure crits are highly recommended. legend ranks apart from legend omen also highly recommended
- miniboss undead creatures: you begin in a safe room but dont bother prepping since u lose buffs when going east. if a leader summons friends, flee and cast prot from undead, otherwise cast prot from undead and flee. use destroy undead to oneshot the non-leaders. if it doesnt die immediately it is the leader and u flee. kill leader last. control spirit, bind spirit me, go to room with jar, open jar
- miniboss fighting yourself: touch sphere, never cast cures on self because they will damage you, spellup, move in any direction, ancestral spirit, flee, regen ancestral, assist ancestral, loot ring (dont wear it yet), cast spectral sight, peer ring.shadows, wear ring.shadows
- final boss queen: sanctify corpse, use your prep, be immheat, soul prot before tick (it lasts about 140 seconds so you'll need to cast it again about 3 times), soul prot must be up at all times (npp is not a substitute), say Senthalliel kISu's'DorRz ENPRUHM puun-pe-uel (fight starts), if she summons creatures, banish creature (twice), if you are losing then 'caress sapphire',

When you have the essences go to the Zeeriak inn and buy a small silver twig. Then go east to (turning toward glacier, then south) the spire and unlock the door (the twig is the key).
With all of the essences in your inventory, walk up the spire and 'worship altar' at the top. Can't get to the top without all of the essences. Be flying and water breath.
After worshipping, the essences will be taken and you will receive 'a small stone tablet' which is the tablet.
